result.reason: Multi-select infrastructure exists (PropertyGrid logic, Tree MultiSelect=true), but the 'Properties' context menu action incorrectly resets selection to a single node, preventing bulk editing when opening the panel.
result.approach: Update OnPropertiesClicked in ConnectionContextMenu to use GetSelectedNodes() and assign to ConfigForm.SelectedTreeNodes, enabling bulk editing even when opening the Config panel via context menu.
